Reference

Data Set

Data sets included in the hakaisalmon package

survey_data

Site, date, and other metadata associated with a survey

seine_data

Time, location, and catch effort of sets

site_activity

Fish surface activty observed during survey transects

bycatch_mort

Species bycatch and mortalities from sets

package_data

Inventory and other metadata associated with packages of fish caught from seines

fish_field_data

Biological measurements and metadata associated with fish caught in the field

fish_lab_data

Biological measurements and metadata associated with fish dissected in the lab

sealice_field

Enumeration of sea lice found on fish in the field

sealice_lab_motiles

Enumeration of sea lice found on fish in the lab

sealice_lab_finescale

Identification of sea lice collected from fish in the lab in 2015 from lice collection protocol *lab_fine_2015*

ysi

Temperature and salinity data

zoop_tows

Zooplankton tow metadata

stock_id

Probable genetic stocks associated a fish

Sample Inventory Data

Data files that contain sample location, processing state, and other sample metadata

sample_container_inventory

Location information for all sample storage containers

Functions

Custom functions for summarizing and analyzing

onAttach()

On attach message

mutate_cond()

A conditional mutate function that allows you to mutate a variable based on another

log_cumul_abund()

Predict the cumulative proportion of catch for the purposes of estimating annual migration timing using a logistic growth equation

lump_fraser_sockeye_stocks()

Lump Fraser River sockeye stocks produced by CBayes at PBS, based on regions according to Chrys Neville

Report Templates

Standard report .Rmd templates

pdf_report_template

An R Markdown .pdf report template

html_report_template

An R Markdown .html report template
